data.title: Madeleine Stowe Biography (1958-)
data.text:
Theatre, Film, and Television Biographies

Ueli Steiger to Milt Tarver

Madeleine Stowe Biography (1958-)

Original name, Madeline Mora Stowe; born August 18, 1958, in Los Angeles (some sources cite Eagle's Rock), CA; daughter of Robert (a civil engineer) and Mireya (maiden name, Mora) Stowe; married Brian Benben (an actor), 1986; children: May, one son. Addresses: Agent: David Schiff, United Talent Agency, 9560 Wilshire Blvd., Suite 500, Beverly Hills, CA 90212.; Manager: CynthiaPett-Dante, Brillstein-Grey Entertainment, 9150 Wilshire Blvd., Suite 350, Beverly Hills, CA 90212.

Nationality

American

Female

Actress

August 18, 1958

California, United States
